name: Edward_Louis_Severson_III
text:
Edward Louis Severson III
Edward Louis Severson III was a singer-songwriter.
In 2016, Severson performed the song "Out of Sand" at the Roadhouse in Twin Peaks, Washington. During the performance, Audrey Horne and Charlie arrived at the bar, looking for Billy. Immediately after the song, Severson left the stage, and was replaced moments later by a jazz combo, who performed "Audrey's Dance."
Edward Louis Severson is the birth name of Eddie Vedder.
